head.title: Cappelli Enterprises to Build Tower on New Rochelle Site

hedline.hl1: Cappelli Enterprises to Build Tower on New Rochelle Site

abstract.p: Officials in New Rochelle, NY, announce plan to sell 1.9-acre downtown lot to Cappelli Enterprises Inc for $2.5 million, which plans to build office/retail tower (S)

block.p: New Rochelle officials announced plans to sell a 1.9-acre downtown lot to Cappelli Enterprises, Inc., the developer of New Roc City, for $2.5 million.

Cappelli plans to build a 250- to 370-foot tower on the site, which would make it the tallest building in New Rochelle. The site includes 319 feet of street frontage along Huguenot Street and offers a maximum development potential of 320,000 square feet for office or combined office and retail use. Cappelli will submit a site plan within 120 days.
New Rochelle officials announced plans to sell a 1.9-acre downtown lot to Cappelli Enterprises, Inc., the developer of New Roc City, for $2.5 million.

Cappelli plans to build a 250- to 370-foot tower on the site, which would make it the tallest building in New Rochelle. The site includes 319 feet of street frontage along Huguenot Street and offers a maximum development potential of 320,000 square feet for office or combined office and retail use. Cappelli will submit a site plan within 120 days.
The City Council will also allow Cappelli to convert office space over the parking garage at New Roc City, which is across from the site, into 92 residential apartments.
